content: परिदा {c3c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To hand or deliver over, consign; छद्मना परिददामि मृत्यवे <ls>U. 1. 46</ls>; <ls>Ms. 9. 327.</ls> {@--2@} To entrust or deposit with. {@--3@} To present. {@--4@} To lend.
परिदा <ab>Ved.</ab> {@--1@} Giving oneself up to the favour of another. {@--2@} Surrender. {@--3@} Devotion.
